meanings.definition: Situated behind and to one side.
meanings.sent1: The posterolateral corner of the room was dimly lit.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her posterolateral area after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The posterolateral position of the hidden cookie jar made it hard to find.
meanings.sent4: His posterolateral thinking helped him solve the puzzle in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The posterolateral view from the window was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Located at the back and to the side.
meanings.sent1: The posterolateral entrance to the building was rarely used.
meanings.sent2: The car sustained damage on its posterolateral side.
meanings.sent3: The posterolateral placement of the plant confused the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her posterolateral approach to the problem surprised her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The posterolateral path through the forest was peaceful.
